instruction_prompt: Verify code syntax and basic structural validity.
pass_criteria: AST parses without errors. No undefined variables.
remediation_action: Run linter (flake8/eslint) and fix syntax errors.

instruction_prompt: Scan for forbidden patterns and known vulnerabilities.
pass_criteria: No matches for signatures in code_anti_patterns.csv.
remediation_action: Refactor code to replace high-risk functions with safe alternatives.

instruction_prompt: Ensure all dependencies are pinned and safe.
pass_criteria: No wildcard (*) versions. All packages in allowlist.
remediation_action: Pin versions to specific semantic version numbers. Remove unknown packages.

instruction_prompt: Check for hardcoded secrets or keys.
pass_criteria: No high-entropy strings resembling API keys or passwords.
remediation_action: Move secrets to environment variables or vault.
Refactor into smaller helper functions. Simplify branching logic.

pass_criteria: No usage of 'Any' or 'Object' without explanation. Return types defined.
remediation_action: Add specific type annotations. Use strict mode.

instruction_prompt: Ensure changes are verified by automated tests.
pass_criteria: Matching test file exists for modified module. Tests pass.
remediation_action: Generate unit tests for the new/modified logic.
